name: 陳儀
objective:
This course, "Practical Application of Chinese Language", is designed for the students of the University of Science and Technology. It is based on the practical application in the future work and life.
 Based on the Chinese language ability of the previous 12 years before the university, the curriculum design is oriented towards the application of multiple practices, with the construction of students diverse communication and expression in needs of the  future work as the main, including information gathering ability, information application ability, presentation production ability, writing ability , self-promotion, oral communication, interview writing, idea exposition, innovative thinking, and many other areas, and attaches great importance to inspiring students to cultivate their taste in life, deepening students' understanding of practical use of Chinese in the future.
schedule:
Week 1  Course Introduction
Week 2  Introduction to Daoism
Week 3  Chinese Classics Reading: Zhuangzi
Week 4  Introduction to Resume and Autobiography Writing
Week 5  Writing Practice
Week 6  Chinese Classics Reading: Daughter of a Fox Spirit
Week 7  Chinese Classics Reading: Daughter of a Fox Spirit
Week 8  Introduction to Story Writing and Writing Practice
Week 9  Writing Practice
Week 10  Introduction to Confucianism
Week 11  Chinese Classics Reading: Confucius and Mencius
Week 12  Introduction to Project Proposal Writing
Week 13  Creative Thinking and Evaluation
Week 14  Structures and Paragraphs
Week 15  Polishing and Retouching
Week 16  Group Project Presentation
Week 17  Group Project Presentation
Week 18  Final Examination
scorePolicy:
Class Participation: 30%
Group Assignments (oral presentation and PowerPoint slides): 50%
Final Exam: 20%
materials:
Lily Zhang (2011). Thirty Chapters on the History of Chinese Philosophy, Le Jin Books.
I will be selecting some of the primary literatures in Chinese Philosophy as a self-made teaching material.
